data.name: Easy Audio Visualization
data.detailed_description:
Warning: This program has settings that contain flashing lights and other material that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. User discretion is advised.

Easy Audio Visualization is made for everyone who wants to add a nice visual effect to his music.
You can add your own background picture, logo and of course your own audio file. You can adjust every element that is used to visualize the music like the light flickering, camera shaking, scale of the logo and the bars or balls.
Once everything is set up as wished, the music can be rendered to an HD .mp4 file.
This software is still under development, so more features will be added soon.

The current features you are able to change:


1. Kind of Visualizer

- Appearance (what visualizer is used)

- Visualizer Color

- Height of the visualizer



2. Audio

- Audio File

- Pitch



3. Background

- Background Color

- Image File (.png, .jpg or .jpeg)



4. Particles

- Speed

- Boost (speed when bass is recognized)

- Particle Color

- Particle Amount (how many particles are spawned)



5. Bass Visualization

- Logo Vibration

- Camera Shake

- Light Multiplier



6. Time Stamp

- Text Color



7. Logo

- Logo Color

- Image File (.png, .jpg or .jpeg)


8. Dance

data.short_description: Easy Audio Visualization is a very easy to use audio visualizer that renders an HD .mp4 video, animated based on your audio. You can use your own background image, logo and audio file.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3217U @ 1.80GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need more disc space depending on the length of the video you want to render.
